data.name: Mr Meal
data.detailed_description:
Become a secret agent

Complete most diverse missions: keep away from robots and solve logic puzzles as a newly employed secret agent. Who is Mr Meal? What is he up to?
{STEAM_APP_IMAGE}/extras/becomeSecretAgent.png

Live in the base

Agency headquarters - this is where you live and prepare for your missions. Here you can meet other individuals and hear their stories. Explore and discover the secrets.

Explore the world

Wander into three nearby towns. Check the sewers and find out what is hidden underground and in the mountains. And that mysterious abandoned town...

Be a part of community

Meeting people on your way will let you hear their stories and uncover the secrets. You can possibly cross paths with Mr Meals's staff.

Be yourself

Make doalogue choices. Collect outfits, and dress as you like.


The game is mostly based on dialogues and puzzle-arcade missions. There are also mini-games both as part of the main storyline and side activities.

-------------------------------------------

Game playtime

You can complete the first and the second chapters in about 4 hours. The 3rd chapter is still to come.

Additional information

This game contains flashing images that may make it unsuitable for people with photosensitive epilepsy or other photosensitive disorders. Please take caution.

data.short_description: You are newly employed agent and you work for an Agency investigating the mysterious Mr Meal. The first day you appeared in your office and right away you got your first mission: find out what is behind all Mr Meal's activities.
data.supported_languages:
English*, Polish
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 or higher, 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo E4500 (2 * 2200) or equivalent
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 9600 GT (512 MB) / Intel HD Graphics 2500
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 80 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: 1080p, 16:9 recommended
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 64-bit operating system
  • Processor: Intel i5-2520M
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon HD 6630 (256 MB)
  • Storage: 80 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: 1080p, 16:9 recommended
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
